protein.specific_function: 1-acyl-glycerone 3-phosphate + a long-chain alcohol = an alkyl-glycerone 3-phosphate + a long-chain acid anion

reference.reference_text: de Vet EC, van den Broek BT, van den Bosch H: Nucleotide sequence of human alkyl-dihydroxyacetonephosphate synthase cDNA reveals the presence of a peroxisomal targeting signal 2. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1997 May 17;1346(1):25-9.
